Description: Rail Works Design Drawing Set - CAD drafting (track layouts rail profiles ballast sections end stop details)
Rail Works Technical Specification - specification writing (rail ballast track construction specs)
Rail Works Design Calculations - track geometry and ballast depth calculations
Rail Works ITR Compilation - installation and test record documentation
Rail Supply - New Tracks 6 & 7 (1000 linear meters heavy rail 115 RE or equiv)
Rail Supply - Track 5 Restoration (300 linear meters)
Track Ties/Sleepers - concrete or timber ties (1300m total track)
Track Fasteners & Hardware - clips spikes plates anchors
Ballast Material Supply - crushed aggregate (1950 m³)
End Stops - hydraulic or mechanical car stops (4 units)
Track Installation - New Tracks 6 & 7 (1000m rail placement alignment fastening)
Track Restoration - Track 5 (300m remove relay align)
Ballast Placement & Compaction - spread level compact test (1950 m³)
End Stop Installation - anchor position test (4 units)
Track Alignment Survey - pre and post installation surveys
Track Geometry Testing - alignment gauge elevation testing
Ballast Material Testing - gradation and compaction verification
Rail Weld Inspection - visual and UT inspection of rail joints
Track Access Coordination - flagging protection during terminal operations
Construction Indirects - field supervision site overhead QA/QC (factor-based)
EPCM / Project Management - PKG-07 allocation (factor-based)
Procurement Services - vendor coordination expediting (factor-based)
Track Commissioning - load testing final verification acceptance
